faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ContPAQi AI Bridge

1.question: Is my data secure?
1.answer: Yes, all processing happens locally on your machine. Your invoice data never leaves your computer or gets sent to any cloud service.

2.question: Which ContPAQi versions are supported?
2.answer: We support ContPAQi Comercial and ContPAQi Contabilidad. The software integrates directly through the official ContPAQi SDK.

3.question: Do I need an internet connection?
3.answer: Only for initial activation and software updates. Once activated, all AI processing works completely offline.

4.question: What invoice formats are supported?
4.answer: We support PDF invoices, scanned images (TIFF, JPG, PNG), and Mexican CFDI electronic invoices (versions 3.3 and 4.0).

5.question: Is there a free trial?
5.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start.

license.question: How does licensing work?
license.answer: Each license is tied to specific machines using hardware fingerprinting. You can activate and deactivate machines from your customer portal.

machines.question: What counts as a machine?
machines.answer: A machine is any Windows computer where you install and activate the software. Virtual machines and physical computers each count as one machine.

invoices.question: What happens if I exceed my invoice limit?
invoices.answer: On the Starter plan, you'll receive a notification when approaching your limit. You can upgrade at any time to continue processing.

refund.question: Is there a refund policy?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time from your customer portal. The price difference will be prorated.
